advancedfilter: A selection of 6 special filters lets you create distinctive photo effects. Filter effects can be verified on the LCD monitor to ensure you get exactly the results you're shooting for.
facedetection: Face detection optimizes people pictures by detecting faces and adjusting focus and exposure to ensure bright, clear results.
lenssystem: Fujinon 46 x zoom lens - 4.3 - 198 mm - f/2.9-6.5
